title: Core Monitoring Alpha
description: Bundles the backlog ordering, milestone container plumbing, and logging improvements required before QA gating can launch.

tasks.notes: NDJSON diff logging must exist before QA reviews can audit task moves.
Introduces milestone scaffolding plus QA gate enforcement.
Task order must remain deterministic before milestone QA can rely on board data.

qa_review.notes: QA reviewer must run checklist once every milestone task reports completion.

acceptance_criteria: All blocking tasks show [x] on their checklists and pass npm/schema validation.
QA checklist completed with reviewer + timestamp and logged via qa_progress.ndjson.
Milestone record updated to qa_pending/in_progress before final completion.
notes: Remote monitors consume snapshot of milestone_index.json to render read-only status.
CLI reorder script must note milestone membership in logs.
